parameters.name: change
parameters.description: Change ID to create a review from

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description for the new review (defaults to change description)

parameters.name: reviewers
parameters.description: A list of reviewers for the new review

parameters.name: requiredReviewers
parameters.description: A list of required reviewers for the new review (v1.1+)

operations.notes:
Pass in a changelist ID to create a review. Optionally, you can also provide a
               description and a list of reviewers.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description:
A review ID to seek to. Reviews up to and including the specified
     *                          `id` are excluded from the results and do not count towards `max`.
     *                          Useful for pagination. Commonly set to the `lastSeen` property from
     *                          a previous query.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description:
Maximum number of reviews to return. This does not guarantee that
     *                          `max` reviews are returned. It does guarantee that the number of
     *                          reviews returned won't exceed `max`. Server-side filtering may
     *                          exclude some reviews for permissions reasons.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
An optional comma-separated list (or array) of fields to show. Omitting this parameter
     *                          or passing an empty value shows all fields.

parameters.name: author[]
parameters.description:
One or more authors to limit reviews by. Reviews with any of the specified authors
     *                          are returned. (v1.2+)

parameters.name: change[]
parameters.description:
One or more change IDs to limit reviews by. Reviews associated with any of the
     *                          specified changes are returned.

parameters.name: hasReviewers
parameters.description:
Boolean option to limit to reviews to those with or without reviewers. Use
     *                          `true` or `false` for JSON-encoded data, `1` for true and or `0` for
     *                          false for form-encoded data. The presence of the parameter without a
     *                          value is evaluated as true.

parameters.name: ids[]
parameters.description:
One or more review IDs to fetch. Only the specified reviews are returned. This
     *                          filter cannot be combined with the `max` parameter.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description:
Keywords to limit reviews by. Only reviews where the description, participants list
     *                          or project list contain the specified keywords are returned.

parameters.name: participants[]
parameters.description:
One or more participants to limit reviews by. Reviews with any of the specified
     *                          participants are returned.

parameters.name: project[]
parameters.description:
One or more projects to limit reviews by. Reviews affecting any of the specified
     *                          projects are returned.

parameters.name: state[]
parameters.description:
One or more states to limit reviews by. Reviews in any of the specified states
     *                          are returned.

parameters.name: passesTests
parameters.description:
Boolean option to limit reviews by tests passing or failing. Use
     *             `true` or `false` for JSON-encoded data, `1` for true and `0` for false for
     *             form-encoded data. The presence of the parameter without a value is evaluated as
     *             true.

parameters.description: Review ID

parameters.description:
An optional comma-separated list (or array) of fields to show. Omitting this parameter
     *                          or passing an empty value shows all fields.

operations.notes: Links the given change to the review and schedules an update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Review ID

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Review State. Valid options: needsReview, needsRevision, approved, archived, rejected

parameters.name: description
parameters.description:
An optional description that is posted as a comment for non-commit transitions.
     *                          Commits that do not include a description default to using the Review description
     *                          in the resulting change description.

parameters.name: commit
parameters.description:
Set this flag to true and provide a state of `approved` in order to trigger the
     *                          *Approve and Commit* action in Swarm.

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: Instruct Swarm to wait for a commit to finish before returning.

parameters.name: jobs[]
parameters.description:
When performing an 'Approve and Commit', one or more jobs can be attached to the review
     *                          as part of the commit process.

parameters.name: fixStatus
parameters.description:
Provide a fix status for the attached job(s) when performing an 'Approve and Commit'.
     *                          Possible status values vary by job specification, but often include:
     *                          open, suspended, closed, review, fixed.

operations.notes:
Transition the review to a new state. When transitioning to approved, you can optionally
               commit the review. (v2+)
